ygData.subject: RE: Vampiric embrace or lifetap?
ygData.msgSnippet: This would be minor improvement, at least then we would have some control over our healing rate, but it does nothing for the rest of our poor spell selection,
ygData.messageBody:
This would be minor improvement, at least then we would have some control
over our healing rate, but it does nothing for the rest of our poor spell
selection, I mean, all a SK has to look forward to at 50 is to an aquatic
Sherri and Lambchop act.(Ie. breath of the dead and voice graft). The life
tap is like the tip of the iceberg when considering the fact that half our
spells relate to or concern summoning useless pets.

Tesaar Grimm
Hand of Innoruuk
The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Hook [mailto:bhook@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 2:15 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Vampiric embrace or lifetap?


From: "Brian Hook" <bhook@...>

Let me ask this -- if Vampiric Embrace was replaced with a Lifetap, would
that be considered an improvement?

Brian
